game.name: isekizima: Ruins and Tails Journey
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: isekizima: Ruins and Tails Journey는 2D 액션 게임입니다. 두 개의 꼬리(네코마타)를 가진 고양이 귀 모험가 키지노가 이세키지마(관광 안내책자에 쓰여진 대로 꿈과 로맨스의 유적지)로 여행을 떠납니다. 민족 음악을 즐기며 숲에 묻힌 유적지를 탐험하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: isekizima: Ruins and Tails Journey is a 2D action game. Kijino, a cat-eared adventurer with two tails (Nekomata), embarks on a journey to Isekizima (Ruins Island of dreams and romance: as it was written in the tourist brochure). Explore ruins buried in the forest while enjoying ethnic music.
